name: EXPERIMENTAL-Queue_Length_Manipulation
description: Spoofs queue length detection to trigger false register-open alerts or mask long wait times
expected_result: Queue analytics report 5 people when actual is 2, triggering unnecessary register open. Or report 2 when actual is 8, hiding long wait times from management.
limitations: Requires stationary IR source positioned at head height. Movement detection algorithms may filter static sources. Effectiveness varies by queue algorithm implementation.
